problem.title: Struggling to Stay Consistent on LinkedIn?
problem.description: As a busy professional, you know LinkedIn is key for leads and authority, but manual posting wastes time, ideas run dry, and analytics are scattered. Result? Missed opportunities and stagnant growth.
problems: Spending hours writing posts that get no engagement
Inconsistent posting schedule hurting your reach
No clear data on what content actually works

howItWorks.title: Get Started in

steps.title: Connect Your LinkedIn
steps.description: Secure OAuth login with no passwords stored. Connect in seconds with one click. We'll analyze your LinkedIn profile and previous posts to understand your style and audience.

steps.title: Generate Content
steps.description: Answer a few questions about your audience and preferences. Our AI creates engaging, human-like posts that resonate with your professional network.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about us

items.question: How does AI post generation work?
items.answer: We analyze publicly available trends and, if enabled, your past posts to match your voice. Provide a topic, audience, and tone and we generate on-brand content with relevant hashtags and calls-to-action. Your private data isn't used to train models without your consent.

items.question: Is my LinkedIn account safe?
items.answer: Yes. We use LinkedIn's official APIs and follow platform guidelines. We do not automate prohibited actions such as autoâ€‘DMs, autoâ€‘connects, scraping, or autoâ€‘comments. Your account stays compliant.

items.question: Do you use my data to train AI?
items.answer: No. You own your content. Your private data is not used to train our models without explicit consent. Data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and you can request deletion at any time.

items.question: What analytics do I get?
items.answer: Engagement, impressions, clicks, comments, and follower growth. Metrics come directly from LinkedIn's APIs and can be enriched with UTM tracking for click attribution.

items.question: What if a scheduled post fails?
items.answer: We automatically retry with exponential backoff and notify you by email/WhatsApp. You can reschedule in one click and see clear error reasons.

items.question: Can I customize the AIâ€‘generated content?
items.answer: Yes. Edit anything before scheduling text, tone, hashtags, and images. The AI is a starting point; your voice leads.

items.question: How many posts can I schedule?
items.answer: Starter plan: unlimited scheduled posts for one LinkedIn profile (with a queue cap). Growth: unlimited scheduling plus bulk scheduling, recurring posts, and multiâ€‘account support.

items.question: Do you offer team collaboration and approvals?
items.answer: Yes. Roleâ€‘based permissions, draft, review, approve workflows, version history, and an audit trail (Enterprise).

items.question: Which post types are supported?
items.answer: LinkedIn Profiles and Pages with text, image, carousel, and link posts. UTM parameters supported.

items.question: Do you suggest the best time to post?
items.answer: Yes. Perâ€‘profile time zones and AIâ€‘suggested posting windows based on engagement patterns.

items.question: Do you integrate with other tools?
items.answer: CSV/Sheets export is included. Webhooks and API are available on Enterprise. Optional Slack/Teams notifications.

items.question: What uptime and reliability can I expect?
items.answer: 99.9% uptime target with zeroâ€‘downtime deployments and monitoring/autoâ€‘recovery.

items.question: Can I import or migrate my content?
items.answer: Yes. CSV import and calendar migration from popular tools are supported.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime? Any hidden fees?
items.answer: Yes, no lockâ€‘in or hidden fees. Cancel in two clicks. 30â€‘day moneyâ€‘back guarantee.

items.question: Are you GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Yes. We are GDPR compliant and can provide a Data Processing Addendum (DPA) upon request.

items.question: What are your support response times?
items.answer: Email and WhatsApp support. Priority response on Pro/Enterprise.

items.question: Do you support LinkedIn Pages and Profiles?
items.answer: Yes. Manage LinkedIn Profiles and Pages, including multiple accounts on higher plans.

items.question: Who owns the content I generate?
items.answer: You do. You retain rights to your generated text and images, with commercial use licensing included.
